object.dialogueText: This time the Gateway Pistol won't help you. Let's check how good you became.
Marvellous! I think you're ready for your job!
I don't hate you. But now you can leave. See you, Dry.
Hey! What are you doing there?
Dry. Please. Come back here. There is a little misunderstanding between us.
I had to test you. To get you ready for your work!
I see that you're good with the Gateway Pistol but... that's not the point!
You had to... live an experience. Solve problems. Risk something... well...
...probably your life is quite too much but... Hey! Listen...
Life and job happens every day, at the same time. Well... probably losing your job is not like losing your life. We've to improve that part of the training program... Details! But...
You've decided to leave the Gateway S.R.L. Good. I won't try to stop you again. But remember what you've truly learned from all this. Bye, Dry. See you around, one day.

Welcome to Life Corp.! The best company EVER! Your curriculum mentions only one skill - you don't have motion sickness! Your previous experience with the Gateway Pistol is quite forgettable - competitors are so weak nowadays. In your stage you'll learn how to use the Life Thrower. Believe me... You'll have great fun!
